price: Katakanlah, "Jikalau Allah menghendaki, niscaya aku tidak membacakannya kepadamu dan Allah tidak (pula) memberitahukannya kepadamu".  Sesungguhnya aku telah tinggal bersamamu beberapa lama sebelumnya 677.  Maka apakah kamu tidak memikirkannya?
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَلَوۡتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَدۡرَىٰكُم بِهِۦۖ فَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُ فِيكُمۡ عُمُرٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law shāa al-lahu mā talawtuhu ʿalaykum walā adrākum bihi faqad labith'tu fīkum ʿumuran min qablihi afalā taʿqilūna
translations: He (would) have made it known to you
He (would) have made it known to you
